title: Mercedes Benz eyes reduced trade barriers from new India government
description: Mercedes-Benz is urging the next government to prioritise the forging of more free trade agreements and reducing trade barriers to boost sales in the country's growing luxury car market. The company's India head emphasized the importance of FTAs for economic growth and expressed optimism for the future of the luxury car segment in India, where sales have been on the rise.
